title: Innovative Funding Plan Would Begin Process of Revitalizing Campus Core (University of Kentucky)
text: ( Source : University of Kentucky ) LEXINGTON, Ky. (Oct. 24, 2015 ) - The University of Kentucky is seeking support during the 2016 session of the General Assembly for an innovative proposal to help fund renovation and revitalization efforts in
